code: import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{FaHome}from"react-icons/fa";import{FaShoppingCart}from"react-icons/fa";import{FaUser}from"react-icons/fa";import'./index.css';import{assets}from'../../assets/assets';import Cookies from'js-cookie';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const location=useLocation();const history=useHistory();const onLogoutClicked=()=>{Cookies.remove('jwt_token');history.replace('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:assets.logo,alt:"logo",className:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item ".concat(location.pathname==='/'?'active':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHome,{className:"nav-icon"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item ".concat(location.pathname==='/cart'?'active':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",className:"link-item cart-basket",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaShoppingCart,{className:"nav-icon"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item ".concat(location.pathname==='/profile'?'active':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUser,{className:"nav-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-dropdown-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile",className:"link-item",children:"Profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-dropdown-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/orders",className:"link-item",children:"Orders"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"logout-button",onClick:onLogoutClicked,children:"Logout"})]})]})})]})]});};export default Navbar;
